SELECT a.id, a.dept_id, a.display_name, a.user_code, a.username, a.avatar, a.phone, a.sex, a.id_card, a.is_lock, a.open_id, a.email, a.post_id, c.post_name, b.dept_name FROM sys_user AS a LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS b ON a.dept_id = b.id AND b.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_post AS c ON a.post_id = c.id AND c.is_delete = 0
a.is_delete = 0
AND a.phone like CONCAT('%' , #{userQuery.phone}, '%')
AND a.username like CONCAT('%' , #{userQuery.username}, '%')
AND a.user_code like CONCAT('%' , #{userQuery.userCode}, '%')
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
